name: Samosa
ingredients: For the dough: Maida (all-purpose flour), ghee, ajwain (carom seeds), salt, and water. For the filling: Boiled potatoes, green peas, cumin seeds, fennel seeds, garam masala, red chili powder, amchoor, and coriander leaves.
prep_instructions: Make a tight dough with the dough ingredients. Prepare the filling by saut√©ing spices and adding potatoes and peas. Shape the dough into cones, stuff with filling, and seal. Deep fry until golden.
serving_instructions: Serves 3-4 people. Serve with mint-coriander chutney or tamarind chutney.
